text.div:
FinnishBaseProfiles

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://hl7.fi/fhir/finnish-base-profiles/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.fi.base

A core set of FHIR resources profiled for use in Finland, published and maintained by HL7 Finland

name: FinnishBaseProfiles
title: Finnish Base Profiles
description: A core set of FHIR resources profiled for use in Finland, published and maintained by HL7 Finland

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.description: Finnish PHR profile for measured or patient-reported time spent on moderate to vigorous physical activity over a period. At this time weekly (period) and 24h period (dateTime) is coded. The profile is based on the Finnish PHR Fitness profile.

resource.name: Patient generated glucose observations and insulin administrations as a bundle, in English
resource.description: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump. Conforms to Kanta PHR R4 profiles.

resource.description: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump. Conforms to Kanta PHR STU3 profiles.

resource.name: Patient generated glucose observations and insulin administrations as a bundle, in Finnish
resource.description: A Bundle of resources uploaded by a patient from a insulin delvery system containing both a continuous glucose sensor and an insulin pump.

resource.name: b88191e3-ea47-4feb-9da9-e3b359fa8fca
resource.description: Selkkipusi takia sinun tulisi hakeutua vlittmsti pivystysvastaanotolle. Alaselkkipu on paikallista ja kestnyt 1 - 4 viikkoa. Potilaalla on kuumetta 38C , potilas on sairastanut syvn tai sairastaa syp, vaikeuksia pidtt virtsaa, vaikeuksia pidtt ulostetta ja vaikeuksia virtsaamisessa (virtsaaminen ei onnistu). Kiireellisesti terveydenhuollon ammattilaisen arviota vaativat oireet: virtsainkontinenssi, virtsaamisvaikeus ja ulosteinkontinenssi. Selkoireeseen liittyy kipua, jonka voimakkuus on 5/10. Selkkipu on alkanut vlittmsti kaatumisen, selkn kohdistuneen iskun tai muun tapaturman jlkeen. Tapaturman sattumistapa: Kompastuin kengnnauhoihin. Yleisvointi on kohtalainen (pystyy tekemn pakolliset pivittiset toiminnot). Kipulke auttaa. Tarvitsee sairauslomaa.

resource.name: care-plan-optional
resource.description:
Selkkipusi takia sinun tulisi hakeutua vlittmsti pivystysvastaanotolle.

Esitiedot Omaolo-oirearviosta (22.5.2020 klo 12:13:14): Alaselkkipu on paikallista ja kestnyt 1 - 4 viikkoa. Potilaalla on kuumetta 38C , potilas on sairastanut syvn tai sairastaa syp, vaikeuksia pidtt virtsaa, vaikeuksia pidtt ulostetta ja vaikeuksia virtsaamisessa (virtsaaminen ei onnistu). Kiireellisesti terveydenhuollon ammattilaisen arviota vaativat oireet: virtsainkontinenssi, virtsaamisvaikeus ja ulosteinkontinenssi. Selkoireeseen liittyy kipua, jonka voimakkuus on 5/10. Selkkipu on alkanut vlittmsti kaatumisen, selkn kohdistuneen iskun tai muun tapaturman jlkeen. Tapaturman sattumistapa: Kompastuin kengnnauhoihin. Yleisvointi on kohtalainen (pystyy tekemn pakolliset pivittiset toiminnot). Kipulke auttaa. Tarvitsee sairauslomaa.

resource.name: fiphr-cs-careplancategory
resource.description: Indicates the plan category.

resource.name: fiphr-cs-consentcategory
resource.description: Finnish PHR Consent Category codes

resource.name: fiphr-cs-fitnesscategory
resource.description: Observation category code for Finnish PHR Fitness Category

resource.name: fiphr-cs-insulincode
resource.description: Finnish PHR Insulin Code System, includes codes indicating what kind of insulin has been administered.

resource.name: fiphr-cs-moderatetovigorouspa
resource.description: Finnish PHR Fitness Codesystem, that defines the code used for daily minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity. Will be replaced with LOINC system code when available.

resource.name: fiphr-cs-observationcategory
resource.description: Finnish PHR Observation Category Code System that defines codes for Observation.category when there is no suitable code in the FHIR standard observation category code system.

resource.name: fiphr-cs-vnrcode
resource.description: Finnish PHR VNR codesystem, that defines VNR codes with CodeSystem.content as not-present.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-careplancategory
resource.description: Indicates type of SelfCarePlan.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-confidentiality
resource.description: Value set for confidentiality codes used in finnish PHR

resource.name: fiphr-vs-consentcategory
resource.description: Finnish PHR Consent Category value set.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-exerciseactivity
resource.description: Finnish PHR Exercise Activity value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-exerciseintensity
resource.description: Finnish PHR Exercise Intensity value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-exercisetracking
resource.description: Finnish PHR Exercise Tracking value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-fitnesscategory-2
resource.description: Fitness Category code.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-fitnesscategory-3
resource.description: Fitness Category code.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-fitnesscategory
resource.description: Fitness Category code.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-fitnessresult
resource.description: This value set indicates the allowed fitness or physical activity result types in Finnish PHR. The concept Daily Activity fitness panel (62812-3) is a grouping structure for a set of physical activity, and for convenience also vital sign, measurements and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set or the parallel Finnish PHR Vital Signs value set (e.g. steps taken, minimum or maximum heart rate, calories burned, moderate to vigorous physical activity minutes, sedentary activity minutes, sleep episodes and exercises).

resource.name: fiphr-vs-insulincode
resource.description: A Finnish PHR value set for the codes to be used with insulin dosing. Includes VNR codes (reference to the national VNR code system) or specific codes to indicate what kind of insulin has been administered.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-macronutrients
resource.description: Finnish PHR Macronutrition Value Set that defines codes for Macronutrients.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-metbystandardrmr
resource.description: Finnish PHR MET by Standard RMR value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-nutrition
resource.description: Finnish PHR Nutrition Value Set that defines codes for Nutrition.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-observationcategory
resource.description: Finnish PHR Observation Category Value Set that defines codes for Observation.category when there is no suitable code in the FHIR standard observation category value set.

resource.name: fiphr-vs-sourceforadjustedmet
resource.description: Finnish PHR Source for Adjusted MET value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-sourceforestimatedmet
resource.description: Finnish PHR Source for Estimated MET value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-sourceforreportedmet
resource.description: Finnish PHR Source for Reported MET value set

resource.name: fiphr-vs-vitalsigns
resource.description: This value set indicates the allowed vital sign result types in Finnish PRH. The concept Vitals signs panel (85353-1) is a grouping structure for a set of vital signs and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set (e.g. respiratory rate, heart rate, BP).  The Blood pressure panel (85354-9) is used to group the component observations Systolic blood pressure (8480-6) and Diastolic blood pressure (8462-4).

resource.name: MedicationAdministration example of insulin basal dose
resource.description: A basal dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. Conforms to the Kanta PHR profile, version STU3. In Swedish.

resource.name: MedicationAdministration example of insulin dose
resource.description: A bolus dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. In Finnish.

resource.name: MedicationAdministration example of temporary basal rate
resource.description: A temporarily adjusted basal dose of fast-acting insulin, administred with an insulin pump. Conforms to the Kanta PHR profile. In English.

resource.name: Kanta PHR - step count mandatory
resource.description: An example step count measurement with mandatory elements.

resource.name: Kanta PHR - blood glucose result as text
resource.description: This is an example, where measurement device has failed to measure numerical value for the blood glucose but the device still can store some result in the narrative element. In this case code 'astext' must be used in dataAbsentReason.coding.code.

resource.name: Kanta PHR - blood glucose with data absent
resource.description: This is an example, where measurement device has failed to measure blood glucose reading. In this case 'error' must be used in dataAbsentReason.coding.code.
